name: part_002
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live ＂STELLAR into the GALAXY＂ Supported By Bushiroad [LtqzI9y5yII]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: A pre-live reel showing flower stands from fans and merchandise information, accompanied by a medley of Hoshimachi Suisei's songs.
Commercial for the trading card game 'Weiss Schwarz' featuring Tokino Sora.

subtitles.original: 空落として まぶたの奥 光を追いかける
subtitles.english: Casting down the sky, I chase the light behind my eyelids.

subtitles.original: 消えてしまう前に 覚えておきたくて
subtitles.english: Before it all disappears, I want to remember.

subtitles.original: ねえ 焦り駆るなんて なぜネガティブなんだっけ
subtitles.english: Hey, why am I so negative, driven by impatience?

subtitles.original: 自問自答 眩い空 状況引き寄せてくる
subtitles.english: Self-questioning, the dazzling sky draws the situation in.

subtitles.original: Ah! Attention please! お待たせもう Attention please!
subtitles.english: Ah! Attention please! Sorry for the wait, attention please!

subtitles.original: 明日より尊い今日の思い出は
subtitles.english: Today's memories are more precious than tomorrow...

subtitles.original: Midnight Paint 綺麗だね 君の生き方 綺麗なんだ
subtitles.english: Midnight Paint. It's beautiful, the way you live is beautiful.

subtitles.original: それぞれが Surely 輝きで満ちてる
subtitles.english: Surely, each and every one is filled with brilliance.

subtitles.original: 今夜彗星になろうよ
subtitles.english: Let's become a comet tonight.

subtitles.original: 君と彗星になるんだ
subtitles.english: I'll become a comet with you.

subtitles.original: 左手で踊る星の一粒さえ この街に欠かせないのなら
subtitles.english: If even a single star dancing in my left hand is essential to this city,

subtitles.original: そんな今日が本当は好ましいんだな
subtitles.english: Then a day like today is actually quite desirable.

subtitles.original: どこまでも Party Party Jet
subtitles.english: To wherever, Party Party Jet!

subtitles.original: どんな夜が明けるまで
subtitles.english: Until whatever kind of dawn breaks.

subtitles.original: 刹那的な Party Party Jet
subtitles.english: A momentary Party Party Jet.

subtitles.original: まだ終われない
subtitles.english: It can't end yet.

subtitles.original: 燃え上がれ Party Party Jet
subtitles.english: Burn bright, Party Party Jet!

subtitles.original: 朝が来たって忘れない
subtitles.english: I won't forget even when morning comes.

subtitles.original: 最高潮の Party Party Jet
subtitles.english: The ultimate Party Party Jet.

subtitles.original: さあ 一緒に Fly
subtitles.english: Now, let's fly together!

subtitles.original: 本音も 建前も
subtitles.english: True feelings and public facades...

subtitles.original: 駆け引き上手な大人は 誰だっけ？
subtitles.english: Who was the adult so skilled at bargaining?

subtitles.original: そんなことお仕置きできない
subtitles.english: I can't punish them for that.

subtitles.original: 便利で 快適で
subtitles.english: Convenient and comfortable,

subtitles.original: 進化し続けるテクノロジー
subtitles.english: technology continues to evolve.

subtitles.original: 伝えて 人肌の温もり
subtitles.english: Convey the warmth of human skin.

subtitles.original: このままずっと降りやまない雨の世界だ
subtitles.english: It's a world where the rain never stops falling.

subtitles.original: もう悲しくない 人になれる生き物だから
subtitles.english: I'm not sad anymore, because I'm a creature that can become human.

subtitles.original: 蒼白になった青春の 何ページ目だったっけ
subtitles.english: Which page was it in that pale youth of mine?

subtitles.original: 今君に会いたいと
subtitles.english: Right now, I want to see you,

subtitles.original: 涙込み上げる
subtitles.english: and tears start to swell.

subtitles.original: 飛んだり 跳ねたり 注意散漫人生の転機が
subtitles.english: Flying and jumping, a distracted turning point in life...

subtitles.original: 新しい時代を乗りこなしていくんだ
subtitles.english: is riding through a new era.

subtitles.original: 透明で 鮮明で 叫び声あげる前乗りで
subtitles.english: Transparent and vivid, riding ahead before let out a cry...

subtitles.original: 繋げよ 失敗しては笑ってゆく
subtitles.english: Connect it, laughing even as we fail.

subtitles.original: このままずっと降りやまない雨の世界だ
subtitles.english: It's a world where the rain never stops falling.

subtitles.original: 愛するしかない それしかない君じゃないから
subtitles.english: There's nothing to do but love, because it's not just you.

subtitles.original: 蒼白になった青春の 何ページ目だったっけ
subtitles.english: Which page was it in that pale youth of mine?

subtitles.original: 忘れ物思い出せないまま
subtitles.english: Unable to remember what I've forgotten...

subtitles.original: 忘れそう このままじゃ
subtitles.english: I'm likely to forget if things stay this way.

subtitles.original: ヴァイスシュヴァルツ
subtitles.english: Weiss Schwarz

subtitles.original: ホロライブプロダクションが ヴァイスシュヴァルツに参戦！
subtitles.english: Hololive Production joins Weiss Schwarz!
